title: Tank Engine Predictive Maintenance
description: An onboard sensor in a main battle tank predicts imminent engine failure based on oil analysis and temperature data.

tasks.description: Receive the predictive failure alert from the tank.
Analyze the specific sensor readings to confirm the high probability of failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer verifies the data indicates a critical problem.

tasks.description: Order the tank crew to return to base for maintenance and schedule a 'power pack' (engine and transmission) replacement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer issues the correct orders to prevent failure in the field and schedules the major repair.
